thread.title: BRIEF-Darwin Deason Files Lawsuit Against Xerox, Fujifilm Holdings Corp

title: BRIEF-Darwin Deason Files Lawsuit Against Xerox, Fujifilm Holdings Corp

organizations.name: brief-darwin deason files lawsuit against xerox

text: February 13, 2018 / 2:53 PM / Updated 39 minutes ago BRIEF-Darwin Deason Files Lawsuit Against Xerox, Fujifilm Holdings Corp Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 13 (Reuters) - * DARWIN DEASON SAYS HAS FILED LAWSUIT AGAINST FUJIFILM HOLDINGS CORP, XEROX, CURRENT XEROX BOARD MEMBERS, & URSULA BURNS, XEROXâ€˜S FORMER CHAIRMAN & CEO * DARWIN DEASON SAYS THE COMPLAINT WAS FILED ON FEBRUARY 13, 2018, IN SUPREME COURT OF STATE OF NEW YORK, NEW YORK COUNTY * DARWIN DEASON SAYS IN COMPLAINT, DEASON SEEKS TO ENJOIN DEAL, TERMINATE XEROX/FUJI JV LOCK-UP, JV AGREEMENTS & PURSUE STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES FOR XEROX Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
